pr_title: fix: more resilient wrt to errors during shadow class building

timeline.message: Replaced throwing an exception 'SpoonClassNotFoundException' with logging.
Added a test when JavaReflectionTreeBuilder throws an exception.
Minor fix. The test for a class and a single test are run differently.

timeline.bodyText: could you add a comment "contract: ..." in natural language where you describe the intention of the test? Thanks
timeline.author: monperrus

timeline.message: Rework of exception ("cannot create shadow class")

timeline.bodyText:
What about catching "IllegalAccessException | ExceptionInInitializerError"?
Thanks a lot for the changes!
